Posts.EditableText:
Hi Alex,
I am trying to override a template from the languagefile. I want to replace "GoListHeader" so I tried to this in the gui changing it in the advanced-section. This does not work, it uses the old templatetext. Then I added it manually to the gamefile, but this doesn't work,too. Do you have an idea whats going wrong?
